text: tavada viśvāsa kaḷavun sadahā upamāvak lesa allāh firavungē biriya idiripat kaḷēya. “māgē paramādhipatiyāṇeni, num̆ba abiyasa (svarga) uyanē nivasak mā venuven idi kara denu mænava ! tavada firavungen da ohugē (napuru) kriyāven da mā mudavā ganu mænava ! tavada aparādhakārī janayāgen mā mudavā ganu mænava !” yæyi æya pavasā siṭiyāya
